Reviews.Title: Nice Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Joe K. "Joe K."
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little camera.  Very easy to use.  I started using it right after I put the batteries in and not even reading the instructions.  Sturdy, nice looking, and small.  Easily fits in any pocket.  I bought a cover for it to protect it.  Takes really nice pictures.  The reason I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars is just like what other people said, it you are not steady the picture will be blured. But I'm pretty sure there is a setting to correct that, I better read the instructions!  I've taken about 90 pictures so far. Very nice color. The batteries lasted for about 75 using flash. And sometimes there is a few seconds delay after you use the flash, but there is a red led on top of the camera to let you know.  Other cameras I've used have done the same thing, so I don't think this is unusual.  This camera also takes videos with sound.  The LCD screen is large and clear enough to see even in the sun. Like I said, maybe I should read the book, and I might give it 5 stars as it has several settings which I haven't tried yet. But it is easy enough to use so you can start taking pictures as soon as you get it out of the box.  So I'm happy I bought it, have taken a lot of really nice pictures, and the price is a lot cheaper than if you bought a similar camera with a more well known brand. I like my little camera!

Reviews.Title: Not bad...
Reviews.Author: Colleen White
Reviews.Content: This is not a bad camera for the price.  It's pretty small, but not as small as the ELPH I had previous to this.  I like the fact that it takes regular AA batteries, since they're easy to come by.  It goes through them pretty quickly, though, so I use rechargeables in it.  What I DON'T like is how long the flash takes to recharge.  There's a significant delay between pictures if you have the flash on.  At least 5 seconds or more.  This is very irritating when you want to take duplicate pictures of the same pose.  Overall, it's a decent camera for the price, but I miss the quality of my old (and much more expensive) camera.

Reviews.Title: nice little point and shoot, simple to operate.
Reviews.Author: LDW
Reviews.Content: This review is for a fine little picture taker with nice zoom range and excellent stability control, ( no blurry pictures ). I read the reviews after purchasing the camera and was shocked at the negativity. This little camera is fun to use if you just want to take pictures without the fuss of doing alot of adjustments. It even has a little icon on the mode wheel for panaramic and is super easy to use. The pictures are crisp, clear, and if you hold it pretty steady you can zoom without blurriness.This is last years model and is at a super price point now. I would highly recommend it.The only con I have found is that it uses 2 AA batteries and with the flash on it eats up the power pretty quickly but then I have rechargeables and will try them.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: Markgbe
Reviews.Content: Easy to use camera. Takes great pictures, and really nice looking videos. Excluding DSLR cameras, this is by far the best digital camera I've used.

Reviews.Title: Very nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Octavia

Reviews.Title: Best in Class
Reviews.Author: Roger P. Camacho "RC"
Reviews.Content: The GE A1250 was shipped on time and what a Great lil camera it is.We are completely satisfied with this purchase and I reccomend it to anyone in this price range.It offers more features than any other camera its price and is great for the studying photographer to be.

Reviews.Title: Handy to Have
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Coppersmith
Reviews.Content: This camera was nice in that it's small and easy to both handle and store in my purse.  However, I was a bit disappointed in the quality of the photos.  I thought that 12MP would give me good depth of color and noticeable crispness.  I had a 4MP camera before this, so I assumed the difference would be rather dramatic.  However, I find the photos from this camera to be sometimes fuzzy in focus and not as impressive as I had hoped.  This camera was used, so perhaps the previous owner did not care for the lens.  It's hard to say if it's the camera or how it was previously used.  Nonetheless, for the purchase price, it was still a bargain and I will get plenty of use out of it.

Reviews.Title: Okay camera for the price
Reviews.Author: SHIRL LYNN HAWKINS
Reviews.Content: I choose the 3 star rating because in my experience with the camera its okay.I purchased this camera (NEW-not used) because I needed something with semi-quality & needed it to be affordable.Pros:Price, Color, Free shipping (awesome), & it allows you to record (videotape) footage.Cons:You'll need 2AA batteries to operate the camera (I had rechargeable ones (Energizer) prior to purchase-which saves a lot of money).  2AA batteries are included but doesn't last long at all.FYI: Duracell batteries didn't work.You must purchase an "SD CARD" (all SD cards don't work-I had a couple on hand prior to purchase).FYI: "LG Micro SD" works well. "PNY Micro SD" didn't work.You must purchase a memory card (I didn't I had a couple on hand prior to purchase. I just erased existing photos because those pictures were saved on my PC anyway).Wrist Strap (for carrying camera) wasn't included.Some of the pictures come out darker (once you upload them to your PC) even after you selected the proper setting (indoor, outdoor, landscape, etc). FYI: Must adjust brightness to photos during the editing process after upload.Overall the camera has been decent (only because I had all the necessary components on hand already). I can't complain especially for the price. Plus its better than having nothing.  I've learned to adjust to my camera, and its serving its purpose.I recommend purchasing the warranty (I DID) just in case something malfunctions or anything happens - ALL ISN'T LOST!

Reviews.Title: Has served me well
Reviews.Author: Christopher Murphy
Reviews.Content: I have had this for a few years now. It is used along side my m4/3 camera. It's easy to use, has AA's and has been durable.It's got a spec of dust on the sensor though, that I can't remove, but otherwise, it's fine.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, but Flawed
Reviews.Author: xXTeH_OrAcLeXx
Reviews.Content: I have owned mine for about 2 years now and it still takes great pics. Blurred images occur when you shake it slightly during press or if it doesnt focus correctly. The biggest issue is for me that when I take pics I need to take a couple in sequence, and this defiantly cant live up to what I need it for. It will have the dreaded "Battery Exhausted" screen pop up and shut off after a couple pictures within a few minutes. Basically its saying the cameras overheating. The batteries are most likely fine and still have plenty of juice though. Give it a few minutes and things can get going again. Also my other complaint is the video, sound is fuzzy, and its being an HD camera CANNOT take HD video. 320x240 or 640x480 are your two options. For the available options for special setup and lighting, it does a pretty good job and is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: great little deal
Reviews.Author: AA
Reviews.Content: Great little camera for the price of about $70.I use rechargable batteries and they last forever on a charge taking 100s of pictures.A few things I noticed though is that no matter how I adjust the settings all the pictures are pretty much at a couple of mega pixels in size (I should be able to adjust this but it does not seem to work).Stitching pictures together in panorama mode also takes about 15 seconds of processing after you take the pictures, a bit long for my taste.I would recommend the camera - at this price it is a steal.

Reviews.Title: ok camera
Reviews.Author: anucha
Reviews.Content: Shutter takes too long to take pictures. 50%Of the pictures come out blurry. Still a good buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: GE Camera.
Reviews.Author: Jean M. Jacobson
Reviews.Content: This one is a good camera, but on this one I have once in a while the batterie door does not conect with  inside batteries, so I have to jiggle it  Over all though I like it.

Reviews.Title: Great little point and shoot
Reviews.Author: sunshyney
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera! I just wanted something cheap that would take decent pictures, and this is a good one! I got great pictures at the Grand Canyon with the panorama setting. The only problems with it are that the night portrait settings kind of blow out the subject with the flash, and there is a little bit longer of a delay with the shutter sometimes, but for $60, can you really complain?

Reviews.Title: Our new GE camera
Reviews.Author: Iris Webb Wright "Iris Wright"
Reviews.Content: My Husband did on-line research before we bought this camera. It seems to be a good camera in general and great for the price! We are very happy with it and with the free shipping and arrival time.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Texas Mark
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for general purpose picture taking. I bought a refurb from one of the Amazon merchants for about $53. The camera arrived in nearly perfect condition. There was one tiny scratch on it, but that is to be expected with a refurb. Without even reading the brief quick start paper I was able to start taking pictures since the menus are very simple to navigate. You will need to download the full manual from GE to get the most out of it. I will note that the camera came with the wrong USB cable and the vendor has not been very helpful about getting me the correct one. However, I use the SD card and trasfering pictures diectly off of the card is always a lot faster than using USB. However it still would be nice to have the correct cable. And since it's a proprietory cable, I would have to buy one specific to this series of cammeras (about $10).This is not the smallest camera out there since it does use AA batteries (which I prefer since you can buy them anywhere). And when it comes to cameras, smaller is not always better. Too small and light can result in blurry pictures from even the slightest movement. Larger and heavier cameras are typically more stable due to the size and weight. As noted by others, this camera does have image stabilization if needed.The picture quality is more than adequate for my needs, and IMO is better than cameras costing around $200. So overall I am very happy with this camera and would recommend it to anyone, especially at the refurb price.

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: summergirl "KSW"
Reviews.Content: This is a remarkable camera. Love the features! Even though it was giving a lens error reading after it accidentally dropped, I was able to fix that problem and get it running smoothly again. The compact size works great for me and so far I am loving all the memories that this camera has been capturing for me

Reviews.Title: Pictures OK, LCD broke after 2 months
Reviews.Author: B. Kempf
Reviews.Content: Had the camera for about 2 months and the pictures were pretty good. Not a lot of advanced features, but for the price, a good little camera.  I always keep the camera in a case that I bought for it.  Took it out one night and the entire LCD was cracked and you couldn't see anything.  Clearly something in my pocket pushed against it, but it wasn't hit or dropped.  If it breaks through a case from mild pressure, I can't recommend this camera due to it's construction.  I called support and LCD is not covered under the year warranty.  They can replace the LCD for $35 plus what I have to pay to ship it to them.  Not sure that I want to spend $40+ to fix a cheaper camera that may have the exact same brittle LCD.  It's possible that I got a bad camera or something from the start, but I definitely would not buy again even at a cheaper price.  At a minimum, if you do get the camera, make sure you get a sturdy case for it to protect the screen.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Sara Roberts "SaraTheGoddess"
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera purchase.  I didn't want to go too high end or too low end. I loved the price of this one, it is really affordable, and its cute and compact.  The pics are excellent.If I had one problem with this camera is that it has virtually no memory! Takes half dozen pics and BAM  you need a memory card if you want more.  Oh well, its still an asweome camera and I'm really glad I bought it.

Reviews.Title: BATTERY EATER ~ POOR PIC QUALITY :o(
Reviews.Author: Knack4Technique
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my photography class, on sale. It sucks the life out of brand name batteries, 2 new last about 1 hour. So, buy the time you purchase a truck load of batteries, you're better off purchasing a camera that has a battery charger with it.Poor pic quality, no happy with it at all.

Reviews.Title: No comparison to my HP
Reviews.Author: John E. Poulin
Reviews.Content: I purchased this from [...]in hopes of replacing my 6mp with a more current 12mp camera.  This camera seems incredibly cheap and even after going thru the owners manual on cd I was still scratching my head. I bought this simply because it was higher megapixels and had 2aa batteries and used a sd card so I had the same set up as my HP.I've always used rechargeable NiMH batteries to save the environment and money and have 6 I keep charged.  I put two in the GE and it powered up and said "batteries exhausted".  These were fresh off the charger.  I put in two others and took 2 pictures and it said "batteries exhausted".  I put the same 2 batteries in my HP and the battery power was full.  I called newegg and they offered to exchange it with another but were good enough to give me my money back.  Maybe I was just having an off day or it was a second shift friday product, but I'll stick with HP.

Reviews.Title: Go ahead and buy, if you like blurry pictures!
Reviews.Author: Christina Rogers
Reviews.Content: I hate this camera!!!  The thing has a delay, sometimes, and it's unpredictible.  So sometimes it will take the picture right away when I press the shutter button, and other times it doesn't until the third time or when it's held down, so then I get a picture of people looking confused or dropping the smiles.  Also, there's no stablization, so the pictures are blurry with any movement at all.  This camera is worthless and a waste of your money.  Do not buy!!!

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Chelsea Rivera
Reviews.Content: I haven't had a chance to use a lot of functions yet.  And I haven't tried to enlarge them, so I don't know what the quality looks like then.  But so far it seems like a good little camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
12MP Digital Camera with 5x optical zoom and 5.7x digital zoom
2.5 Inch vibrant LCD with auto brightness
24 MB internal memory with SD/SDHC card support up to an additional 8 GB
Auto scene, blink, smile and face detection
Uses 2 AA batteries so you'll never be stranded waiting for your camera battery to charge
ProductInfo.Name: GE A1250-BK 12MP Digital Camera with 5X Optical Zoom and 2.5 Inch LCD  with Auto Brightness - Black
